thread.title: Beatrice Witzgall wins Golden in A' International Mobile Design Awards
thread.title_full: Beatrice Witzgall wins Golden in A' International Mobile Design Awards - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Beatrice Witzgall wins Golden in A' International Mobile Design Awards
text:
LumiFi by Beatrice Witzgall wins Golden A' Design Award in Mobile Technologies, Applications and Software Design Competition
Como, Italy (PRWEB) September 21, 2015
A' Design Award and Competition is pleased to inform that the design project LumiFi by Beatrice Witzgall has been announced as a winner of the Golden A' Design Award in Mobile Technologies, Applications and Software Design Competition Category.
Insights on LumiFi
Beatrice Witzgall, the designer of the awarded Mobile project LumiFi said “LumiFi is a design and technology-centric company enabling people and businesses to unlock the full potential of connected lighting through a new lighting control software. Incorporating smart LED wireless bulb technology and the expertise of award-winning designers, Lumifi offers customizable lighting moods in hotels, homes and offices. The unique technology enables users to experience fully composed lighting scenes with the simple tap of their smartphone. ” Learn more and download high-resolution photos at: https://competition.adesignaward.com/design.php?ID=40121
Design Team for LumiFi
LumiFi was designed by Design Direction: Beatrice Wizgall, Technical Team: Thomas Jacoki, Peter May, Karl Reinisch, Graphic UX/UI Design: Brandon Brown, Weston Baker and Architectural and Lighting Design Team: Ian Slover, Ute Besenecker, Roxana Hathaway, Fabiana Weinberg
The Golden A' Design Award
The Golden A' Design Award is a prestigious award given to top 3% percentile designs that has exhibited an exemplary level of excellence in design and arts. Entries to the A' Mobile design competition are peer reviewed and anonymously judged by artists, scholars and press members following strict evaluation guidelines. Laureates of the A' Design Award are granted a series of PR and Publicity services such as exhibition of their work in Italy, as well as online sites such as DM Design Magazine . Award winners are also invited to make use of design mediators, designer rankings, design adage and other platforms designed by the A' Design Awards.
About A' Design Award and Competitions
A'Design Award and Competitions, aims to highlight the excellent qualifications of best designs, design concepts and design oriented products. A' Design Award and Competitions are organized and awarded annually and internationally in multiple categories to reach a wide, design-oriented audience. Learn more: http://www.whatisadesignaward.com
 //www.prweb.com/releases/2015/09/prweb12973102.htm
